pluginstrument.author: enjxp_SimPassion
pluginstrument.description:
Compatible with the B737-800X ZiboMod
ReleaseComments 0.0.5Added Annunciators hardware LEDs handling Added 3 buttons for current Gears Handle 3 positions (Software and Hardware) Added Toggle button for showing/hiding the 3 green marks helpers (Software and Hardware) Corrected handle behavior 0.0.4Fixed behavior from new Landing Gears lever handling in the ZiboMod 0.0.3Updated ScriptAuthor variable 0.0.2Added version number displayed to be able to check version on tablet devices Added ability to hide check infos 0.0.1Initial release
